TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/EOFActionEnum extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks В Visual Basic 6.0 `EOFAction` свойство было использовано, чтобы определить, какое действие `ADODC` принимает при `EOF` имеет значение true.In Visual Basic 6.0, the `EOFAction` property was used to determine what action the `ADODC` takes when the `EOF` property is true. Эти константы включают код, который был обновлен с Visual Basic 6.0, чтобы продолжить работу без дополнительных изменений.These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > Функции и объекты пространства имен используются в средствах, предназначенных для обновления версии Visual Basic 6.0 до Visual Basic.Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. В большинстве случаев эти функции и объекты дублируют функциональные возможности, можно найти в других пространствах имен в [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. Они необходимы только если модель кода Visual Basic 6.0 значительно отличается от [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] реализации.They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: Moving past the last record triggers the 's event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic , followed by a event on the new record.

span.span: Moving past the last record triggers the 's event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic , followed by a event on the new record.

span.span: Keeps the last record as the current record.
